meanings.definition: Decorated with a border or edging
meanings.sent1: The purfled curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The princess wore a purfled gown to the royal ball.
meanings.sent3: The purfled cake looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her purfled hair sparkled in the sunlight like a crown.
meanings.sent5: The purfled frame enhanced the beauty of the painting.

meanings.definition: To decorate with a border or edging
meanings.sent1: She purfled the invitation cards with delicate lace.
meanings.sent2: The artist purfled the edges of the canvas with gold paint.
meanings.sent3: He purfled his notebook with doodles during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent4: The gardener purfled the garden path with colorful stones.
meanings.sent5: The tailor purfled the dress with intricate embroidery.
